an3.20:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato papaniko nacirasseva mahattam vepullattam papunati bhogesu.
an3.20:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, papaniko cakkhuma ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca.
an3.20:1.6: ‘idam paniyam evam kitam, evam vikkayamanam, ettakam mulam bhavissati, ettako udayo’ti.
an3.20:1.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papaniko cakkhuma hoti.
an3.20:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papaniko kusalo hoti paniyam ketunca vikketunca.
an3.20:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papaniko vidhuro hoti.
an3.20:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papanikam ye te gahapati va gahapatiputta va addha mahaddhana mahabhoga te evam jananti:
an3.20:3.3: ‘ayam kho bhavam papaniko cakkhuma vidhuro ca patibalo puttadaranca posetum, amhakanca kalena kalam anuppadatun’ti.
an3.20:3.5: ‘ito, samma papanika, bhoge karitva puttadaranca posehi, amhakanca kalena kalam anuppadehi’ti.
an3.20:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papaniko nissayasampanno hoti.
an3.20:3.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato papaniko nacirasseva mahattam vepullattam papunati bhogesu.
an3.20:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahattam vepullattam papunati kusalesu dhammesu.
an3.20:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuma ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca.
an3.20:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.20:4.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuma hoti.
an3.20:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an3.20:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vidhuro hoti.
an3.20:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu bahussuta agatagama dhammadhara vinayadhara matikadhara te kalena kalam upasankamitva paripucchati paripanhati:
an3.20:6.4: Tassa te ayasmanto avivatanceva vivaranti, anuttanikatanca uttanikaronti, anekavihitesu ca kankhathaniyesu dhammesu kankham pativinodenti.
an3.20:6.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti.
an3.20:6.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahattam vepullattam papunati kusalesu dhammesu”ti.
